divs: Sighting Detailsthis is my secound encounter and as i sit here my heart is starting to race.ok.this sighting happend in january of 1996.it was witnessed by me my wife,also her secound(reported to MUFON already)and my brother in-law.it was 10 pm and we were in pasadena texas and lived on vista between the beltway and burke st..we were on our way to block buster to take back some movies.my wife is driving,im in the passenger seat and my brother in-law behind me.where driving down vista and im looking out the window and notice what i thought was an airplane.being that we live around air ports its normal to see them flying.but this thing.im picturing it my head now and this thing had no lights and it was dark.thats what caught my attn. but what really got me to say something was it was just sitting there.at that time it was a distance away.i told them look,look what is that.my wife and my brother in-law start to watch with shock.by this time we are coming up to a turn.the street im talking about is the entrance to bayshore hospital.this part is were it gets wierd.we want to see this obect so we make the turn and pull into a drive way of the townhouses.but what was first at a distance,and this is were i have to explain becouse its so strange.as soon as we put the car in park we jump out and the next thing we see is this craft right above us.as i write this im feeling real angsiaty now.what i remember is im looking up and can see the bottom it dark in color but i can see that its ridged.in that instance when we jumped out it started moving away totally silent we watch it float away,and we then go on to block buster.for some reason after this encounter when i think now we never talked about it.til now.this thing was so larg i dont remember even seeing the sides of it. now what im about to tell you is why im reaching out to MUFON.this is what i just found out about my wifes memory of the sighting.she said she did remember seeing the craft and thinking like we were what is this.i asked her what do you remember when we jumped out of the car?and i was shocked to what she told me.she said that as soon as we jumped out she saw a bright white light coming from the bottom of the craft.this gave me chills.then she told me "thats what i thought it was weird hearing you say it was black and ridged,she recalled a engulfing light.so this is the reason i felt so strongly on reporting.but nervous as i start to put things together,its overwellming.this craft was over us,and the hospital was no more then 500 ft.from us.this was me and my wifes secound encounter and this one was so diffrent then the first.you might be asking about my brother in-law.just recently he has made contact with us.since we havent seen him in 9 years.im going to write him and ask him about that nite in 96.i am going to make no mention of what i have reported today to him in hopes to discover another piece of this puzzle.i will surely keep everyone informed.(story is completly true).and the reason im here is to hopefully get some answers. i am serious about this and would only want serious feed back.if i can make contact with someone i can trust i want to tell you of the dream i had a couple of years later that really got this ball rollin.thnx so much-Brother ROB
Summary: My description of the craft has two parts. Along with questions I have about it.
